directions: In a large stock pot over medium heat, pour in the vegetable broth, apple cider, apple juice, and water; stir in  kosher salt, poultry seasoning, onion powder, black pepper, rosemary, sage, and thyme. Bring the mixture to a boil, stirring until all salt has dissolved, and boil for 30 minutes to extract flavors from herbs. Remove from heat, and allow to cool to room temperature before using as a turkey brine; allow brined turkey to marinate overnight.
title: Joe's Turkey Brine
